recommendations.title: Enhance Visual Hierarchy of Login Form
recommendations.description: Increase the size and contrast of the login button to make it more prominent and visually distinct from other elements on the page.
recommendations.expected_impact: Improves visibility and accessibility, encouraging users to complete the login process.
recommendations.justification: With no feedback or high traffic areas identified, enhancing key action elements can guide users more effectively.

before_after.before: Login button is similar in size and color to other elements, making it less noticeable.
before_after.after: Login button is larger and has a higher contrast color, making it stand out.

recommendations.title: Simplify Input Field Labels
recommendations.description: Ensure that input field labels are clear and concise, and consider using placeholder text to provide additional guidance.
recommendations.expected_impact: Reduces potential confusion and helps users understand what information is required.
recommendations.justification: Although no confusion areas were identified, simplifying labels can preemptively address potential user misunderstandings.

before_after.before: Labels are present but may not be clear or concise.
before_after.after: Labels are simplified and placeholders provide additional context.

implementation_notes: Focus on enhancing existing components to improve user guidance and reduce potential friction points.
general_observations: The lack of feedback and identified issues suggests the page is functional, but improvements in visual hierarchy and clarity can enhance user experience.
